Use and care

Easy steps to keep it clean and fresh
Before start to use:
1
Rinse the bottle with a weak solution of vinegar
Pour tap water into the aqua-enriched water just above the filter level, add 2 tablespoons of weak vinegar solution 6-9% (apple, rice). Then shake the aqua-dresser until a thick foam
2
Rinse with tap water
Rinse several times with tap water until the odor of vinegar is completely eliminated.
Care routing:
1
Once per day
Rinse with tap water
2
Once per week
Wash with a mild vinegar solution until foamy
3
Once per year
Replace the filter cartridge
4
Water
Use bottled or filtered water
